Stop-loss strategy: Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the EPS turns negative.
Trailing Stop Loss: if the stock price falls by 8% from its peak, sell.
[Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the ROE and ROA indicators show a significant decline]
If the stock price falls by 8% from the current price, trigger a sell order.
